title: Possibles
description: A man dedicated to bachelorhood, Steven Blake was wary of women. But he did have a genetic obsession with redheads - and Sarah Moore was definitely a redhead. Sarah, however, had given up on men! Especially when the man was Steven Blake, her new boss. Somehow Steven had to convince her that with his dark hair and eyes, his shaggy brows and his firm, athletic body, he wasn't just a possible for husband material...he was a probable!
author: Lass Small
